import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Avatar, Typography, Button, TextField } from "@material-ui/core"; import { Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; class Edit_intro_Modal extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { credentials: { // this is for store the user credentials like username and password firstName: "", lastName: "", headline: "", education: "", country: "", location: "", industry: "", }, }; } render() { return ( this.setState({ profileModalShow: false })} > Edit intro
{/* Headline */} {/* Country */} {/* Location */} {/* Industry */} ); } } const save_button = { paddingLeft: "20px", paddingRight: "20px", marginTop: "10px", marginLeft: "10px", fontWeight: "bold", borderRadius: "50px", display: "flex", background: "#0c66c2", color: "white", border: "solid 1px #0c66c2", }; export default Edit_intro_Modal;
